8.10.12.name: wordpress/monoblog-8912
8.10.12.description:
Combines the awesome functionality of MediaElement.js HTML5 media player and Plupload to enable you or the authors of your site to upload mp3s of people reading the text of your blogs.

If you so choose, this plugin can also generate an audio podcast of your Monoblog content.

Check out OwnTheNarrative.com for more information and examples.

Setup

After activating, while still in the admin panel, go to Appearance->Widgets. Then click and drag the Monoblog widget to whatever sidebar/area you want. NOTE: The sidebar/widget area must be visible in your posts in order for this to work.
